newsitem.title: UK: Exceler has 69.6 pct of Ashbourne.
newsitem.headline: Exceler has 69.6 pct of Ashbourne.

text.p: Britain's Exceler Health Care Group Plc, a unit of healthcare group Sun Health Care, said on Tuesday it had received acceptances for 37.36 million shares in Ashbourne Plc, representing 69.6 percent of the company's issued ordinary share capital.
Exceler said this included 1,413,129 shares for which it had irrevocable acceptances.
Exceler had agreed on a price of 177 pence per share valuing the issued capital of Ashbourne at about 95 million stg.
Exceler had earlier owned 15,650,336 shares representing 29.2 percent in Ashbourne. It now owns or has valid acceptances in 53,012,231 Ashbourne shares representing 98.8 percent of its equity.
